feed.title: 7 Theses on a next step for BIP-119

entry.title: 7 Theses on a next step for BIP-119
entry.summary: Jeremy has shared his next step in advocating for CTV (Consensus-enforced Transaction Validity), along with seven theses explaining why he believes it to be the right course of action. He provided a link to his post on rubin.io, which is also archived on web.archive.org.The purpose of this update is to prepare for the CTV meeting scheduled for today. Jeremy invites feedback on his proposal, indicating his openness to constructive criticism.
